coreAttributes.authorTag: On the underside of the stock, slightly raised lettering reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: cryoprism gun
coreAttributes.description: Having the longest reach in the Enforcer arsenal, the cryoprism gun uses a [style.colourIce(freezing)] [style.colourLegendary(clear demonstone)] as the active medium of an otherwise normal quad-pumped solid state laser. The result turns a mildly annoying laser beam into a powerful freeze ray with a perfectly flat trajectory.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] out the cryoprism and [npc.verb(turn)] the selector switch to the fire position. There is a brief, unnerving hum as the arcane power source inside comes to life.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] the selector switch back to the safe position and [npc.verb(put)] the rifle away.
coreAttributes.onCriticalHitEffect: #IF (!npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_FREEZING_FOG)) [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_FREEZING_FOG, 4)] A [style.boldIce(freezing fog)] settles around [npc2.name]! #ELSEIF (npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_FREEZING_FOG) && !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_FROZEN)) [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_FROZEN, 2)] [##npc2.removeStatusEffect(SE_FREEZING_FOG)] The [style.colourIce(fog)] around [npc2.name] flash-freezes [style.boldIce(thin layer of ice)]! #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] [npc2.name] up in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. A bright blue beam of light smashes into [npc2.her] aura. A faint trail of snowflakes flutters delicately in the air as the light fades.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] [npc2.name] up in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. The shot goes wide! The beam uselessly creates a large patch of ice some distance away.
